subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Andre Miller and Marreese Speights each scored 15 points, and Royal Ivey ignited a second-half comeback with 11 off the bench Saturday as the 76ers beat the visiting Miami Heat, 94-84.
snippet: Andre Miller and Marreese Speights each scored 15 points, and Royal Ivey ignited a second-half comeback with 11 off the bench Saturday as the 76ers beat the visiting Miami Heat, 94-84.
